tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE student_info (
    student_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(255),
    last_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    nationality VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE country (id INT PRIMARY KEY, country_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL); CREATE TABLE student (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, country_id INT, proficiency_level VARCHAR(20)); CREATE TABLE language (id INT PRIMARY KEY, language_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL); CREATE TABLE student_languages (student_id INT, language_id INT);

CREATE TABLE Students (
  student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  country VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  language VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  proficiency_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE StudentProgress (
  progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT,
  language_id INT,
  level_id INT,
  progress_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES Students(student_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (language_id) REFERENCES Languages(language_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (level_id) REFERENCES ProficiencyLevels(level_id)
);
